tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    recorded_at TIMESTAMP,
    drone_id INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data ( 
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    temperature DECIMAL, 
    humidity DECIMAL, 
    wind_speed DECIMAL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CropPerformance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    yield FLOAT,
    growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherCropCorrelation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weather_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    wind_direction VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DroneData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    battery_level DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CropData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    yield DECIMAL,
    quality DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_performance (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    yield FLOAT,
    temperature_threshold FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE drone_data (
    drone_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    weather_id INT,
    crop_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE correlation_data (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_data_id INT,
    crop_performance_id INT,
    correlation_value FLOAT
)
